类的使用
org.apache.tomcat.util.modeler.ManagedBean

  • 使用ManagedBean的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.catalina.mbeans  
    org.apache.tomcat.util.modeler
    The Modeler component of the Commons project offers convenient support for configuring and instantiating Model MBeans (management beans), as described in the JMX Specification.
    org.apache.tomcat.util.modeler.modules
    Implementation classes - should not be used directly.

    • org.apache.catalina.mbeans中ManagedBean的使用

      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected ManagedBean UserMBean.managed
      The ManagedBean information describing this MBean.
      protected ManagedBean RoleMBean.managed
      The ManagedBean information describing this MBean.
      protected ManagedBean NamingResourcesMBean.managed
      The ManagedBean information describing this MBean.
      protected ManagedBean MemoryUserDatabaseMBean.managed
      The ManagedBean information describing this MBean.
      protected ManagedBean GroupMBean.managed
      The ManagedBean information describing this MBean.
      protected ManagedBean MemoryUserDatabaseMBean.managedGroup
      The ManagedBean information describing Group MBeans.
      protected ManagedBean MemoryUserDatabaseMBean.managedRole
      The ManagedBean information describing Group MBeans.
      protected ManagedBean MemoryUserDatabaseMBean.managedUser
      The ManagedBean information describing User MBeans.

      返回ManagedBean的org.apache.tomcat.util.modeler中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ManagedBean Registry.findManagedBean(java.lang.Class<?> beanClass, java.lang.String type)
      已过时。  
      ManagedBean Registry.findManagedBean(java.lang.Object bean, java.lang.Class<?> beanClass, java.lang.String type)
      Find or load metadata.
      ManagedBean Registry.findManagedBean(java.lang.String name)
      Find and return the managed bean definition for the specified bean name, if any; otherwise return null.
      参数类型为ManagedBean的org.apache.tomcat.util.modeler中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Registry.addManagedBean(ManagedBean bean)
      Add a new bean metadata to the set of beans known to this registry.
      void Registry.removeManagedBean(ManagedBean bean)
      Remove an existing bean from the set of beans known to this registry.
      void BaseModelMBean.setManagedBean(ManagedBean managedBean)
